com.bizosys.hsearch.common
Class HField

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.common.HField
All Implemented Interfaces:
Field
public class HField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Field

The field can carry any value Java basic data types and other List, Complex Objects which has implemented IStorable interface for extracting the byte array.

See Also:
IStorable
